participant_1.name: Eli
participant_1.personality: Curious and determined, Eli often pushes boundaries while navigating his unique abilities.
participant_1.background: i was born with my heart outside my body. i had to have a transplant. i can move objects with my mind. i'm a boy.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Passionate and resilient, Liam fights for his dreams despite the challenges he faces.
participant_2.background: i play the piano and guitar and sing. my parents aren't very supportive of my dream. i also work as a custodian to help pay the bills. my favorite type of music to sing is folk music. i am a musician and hope to make it big some day.
